mapper.select: SELECT bno, cno, title, writer, view, regDate, modDate FROM board ORDER BY bno DESC limit 0, 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (writer, password, title, content, cno) VALUES (#{writer}, #{password}, #{title}, #{content}, #{cno})
mapper.select: SELECT bno, category.category, title, writer, view, regDate, modDate FROM board JOIN category ON board.cno = category.cno WHERE bno = #{bno}
